"â– The anime will end its run in TV Tokyo's 6:00 p.m. Tuesday timeslot on March 27. Following March 27, the following episodes will begin to air on TV Osaka's 6:30 p.m. Tuesday timeslot."

In short:: Bleach is MOVING FROM One Channel to the Other !!!!!!

Yes, and now the site you referenced says this in its news feed: 

Episode 366 was the last anime episode, but the manga is still ongoing and has entered its final story arc. The English dub continues as normal.
SGKK has released all episodes up to 366 now as well as "The Hell Chapter"
